title: Interpretation of a dream about the police arresting me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the police arresting me in a dream. The police are always the safety valve and the country’s protective shield from criminals and traitors. Seeing the police in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate good or bad depending. You may be interested in meeting a dead father in a dream and seeing the police arresting someone. This may indicate To commit injustice and sin, and in this case it is a warning to the monarch to stay away from the path of evil and avoid sin. Police in a dream can indicate safety, protection, strength and courage. For a girl, this indicates her marriage to a young man who has good qualities such as good character, strength, chivalry, and chivalry. The police arrest a person and then release him indicates financial and economic crises and then he emerges from these crises. In this article, we will explain seeing the police in a dream for men and women on the Summit website. Interpretation of dreams for a mother being arrested by the police. Indicate the problems that the viewer is exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about being arrested A single woman by the police indicates the girl’s marriage, happiness, and sense of comfort and security. Interpretation of a dream about my lover being arrested by the police indicates exposure to adversity and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about a raid: It indicates the disclosure of secrets and scandals. Interpretation of seeing the police arresting me in a dream. I was stuck on the interpretation of a dream about the police. Seeing the police in a dream It is one of the visions that can indicate good or bad. Seeing the police in a dream indicates overcoming difficulties and can also indicate strength, determination, and the fulfillment of all the dreamer’s desires. Seeing the dreamer being arrested by the police is one of the warning visions that warns the dreamer of danger. He must be careful, otherwise he is on the path of delusion and distance from God, and he must improve his path and stay away. Of sins and avoid mistakes that you may fall into. To see the police chasing him in a dream, this indicates many problems that he faces and he needs to think calmly and wisely to solve them. See also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my husband being arrested by the police. A dream that shows the police arresting a husband indicates In a dream, it indicates that you will commit many mistakes or sins that you need to abandon. The vision may indicate abuse by the husband by his wife. Seeing the police in a dream indicates the cessation of stress and tension and living in peace and security, free of worry and sadness. See also: Seeing 500 riyals in Interpretation of a dream about a single woman being arrested by the police. Seeing the police on a single girl in her dream shows a sense of comfort and security, overcoming difficult stages, and strength and courage in going through crises. It also indicates the fulfillment of her desires and the high and distinguished position she will reach one day. Also, to see the police while She arrests a person, this indicates her marriage to a person with whom she feels safe and protected. Seeing the police arresting a girl is a dream that indicates sins or remorse for those sins or actions and words that she will regret. title: What is the interpretation of a dead person urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: There are many visions in which the dead appear, and we do not find a suitable explanation for them. We seek this vision to find out its various meanings, including these visions, seeing the dead person urinating. The article will explain in detail each interpretation of the vision: A dead person urinates in a dream. A dead person urinates in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A dead person urinates in a dream. Urinating on a dead person in a dream has different meanings and interpretations, as it can bring goodness to its owner, and at another time it is a message warning him of the appearance of something unpleasant for him. The vision also shows that the dreamer must deceive the orders of the dead and carry them out without belittling them or replacing them with anything. Seeing the urine of a dead person often indicates that the dead person has a debt that he did not pay while he was alive, and he wants to pay this debt through the owner of the vision so that he can feel comfortable in his grave. If the dreamer is suffering from distress, worries, and sorrows that do not leave him, then this vision is good news for the arrival of happiness, getting rid of problems, and abundant livelihood coming to him. If the dreamer sees that the dead person smiles and laughs when urinating, this means that he feels comfortable in his grave due to continuous supplication. Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer’s vision of the dead person urinating in his dream has meanings related to the dreamer and the dead person. Regarding his interpretation of the dead person, the vision shows that he committed transgressions and misdeeds in his life, and his inability to repent throughout his life, which makes him suffer from torture and regret for not using the time for useful things. For the vision, this is evidence that he does not visit the dead in the cemetery for a long time. It also indicates the desire of the deceased to complete some tasks that he could not fully carry out while he was on earth. The vision is a sign of comfort for the dreamer after living a life full of difficulties and instability. The dead person urinated in a dream, according to what Ibn Sirin narrated, indicating that the dreamer He acquires wealth and the luxury of life. It also states that the dreamer will find all the solutions to some problems that he considers unsolvable. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dead person urinating on the living indicates that he will soon be blessed with goodness and blessings in his life. The dead person urinating in a dream for a single woman if an unmarried woman sees that the dead person is urinating In her home, this is a sign that good news will reach her soon. But seeing a dead person urinating in her workplace is evidence of the problems that she may face in her work. The vision may indicate the achievement of his goals and ambitions that he dreamed of achieving in the past. If an unmarried woman sees that her father, who left The world may urinate, and the urine gets on her clothes, then this is a sign that her life will change for the better. And when she sees her deceased mother urinating on her, this indicates that this girl will soon marry a man with good morals. If she is suffering from some financial problems, then this vision is an indication that she will be blessed. With goodness and living. The dead person urinates in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees the dead person urinating in her dream, this is evidence of stability and comfort in her circumstances. If she is suffering from some marital problems, then this vision indicates...

title: Interpretation of cow's milk in a dream: Seeing milk in a dream

preview.html: By seeing yourself drinking cow’s milk or milk in a dream, many different situations were mentioned in this vision, as each of the different cases has meanings and connotations that often bring goodness to the dreamer with it. The interpretation of drinking milk or cow’s milk in a dream was mentioned by Imam Ibn Sirin, may he have mercy on him. God, in his interpretation, says that seeing milk or buttermilk in a dream has many general meanings, the details of which were mentioned in the various cases in which the dreamer appears in the dream. And wealth is free from doubt or forbidden. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking cow’s milk or milk in his dream, his vision shows the strength of his faith and religion and that this fortuneteller has common sense, and it was also said that other than this interpretation, there are many other things. The meanings indicate seeing drinking cow's milk or milk in a dream, and this depends on the condition of the dreamer who he is in reality. If the dreamer is a farmer, then his vision of this state shows fertility, goodness, and great living. Which he obtains in his year, and for the merchant or the owner of crafts and various businesses, it is profit and abundant money that the person with this vision actually obtains. It is said that if a poor person sees in his dream that he is drinking milk or cow’s milk, then his vision shows wealth and the acquisition of money, and the situation will change for the better and end Suffering from poverty and deprivation, God willing. For the freedom he obtains in waking life and his release from shackles and prison, and seeing a slave drinking cow’s milk or milk in a dream, this condition indicates that this slave has been liberated from his slavery and attained freedom by releasing his master. Interpretation of drinking milk - YouTube

title: Interpretation of stone in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of stone in a dream. You can find stones around you, whether you are on the street, in the park, at home, or even on construction sites and construction sites, but have you ever stopped to find out what you see meaning for them in a dream? This is what you will learn in detail in the interpretation Ibn Sirin, who sees a stone in a dream, in the following lines from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a stone in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a stone in a dream, by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation of seeing a stone in a dream that a stone in a dream is one of the undesirable things, because it indicates the spread of injustice, deception, hypocrisy, and deceptive feelings in the world. The dreamer’s life. As for the dream of carrying heavy stones, it indicates the weakness of the character of the dreamer, the presence of evil and religious friends in his life, and his entry into many false emotional relationships, and God knows best. Also, seeing the dreamer throwing stones at others in a dream is evidence of the sins he commits and the sins he commits. Sins from his bad reputation, so he returns to the path of truth and stops these sins. A person who sees himself throwing many stones from a high place shows that he enjoys high esteem and a high status among people because of his good character and good character among them. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating stones, this indicates His despair in completing the matter that he had hoped for a long time ago. Also, dreaming that he is eating a stone with bread means that the dreamer will suffer from great pressure at work due to his difficult financial circumstances. And whoever sees in his dream that he has turned into a stone, this indicates the corruption of his religion, the hardness of his heart, and his disobedience. Always obeying the commands of God Almighty. When you see stones falling from the sky to the earth, this is evidence of the presence of a corrupt ruler or official heading a group of people, and this vision shows the impact of some disasters and fears on the lives of God Almighty. Interpretation of a white stone in a dream: seeing large numbers of white stones in a dream. The dream indicates the stable and successful life that the dreamer enjoys, and also shows the good share of the world. Seeing a white stone falling in a dream predicts cheap prices for goods and products in the dreamer’s home. Also, seeing a white stone foretells a long life and marriage to a woman with good morals and a good heart. When a person with a great position, power, or relationship sees a white stone in his dream, this means that he will continue to hold this position for a long time. Whereas seeing the loss of a white stone in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer financial losses in his trade or that he will lose many opportunities. Rare things in his life without benefiting from them. When the dreamer sees in his dream that some people are throwing white stones at him, this is a sign that he will face some obstacles and fears in his coming days. Interpretation of a dream about stones in a dream for a single woman: For a single woman to see in her dream that one of her friends is beating her, insulting her, and throwing at her. Stoned intentionally means that this friend is really bad for her, always talks lies about her and doesn't want anything good. Not at all for her. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that there is someone...

title: Interpretation of a sick person in a dream. The meaning of illness in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing someone I know sick Someone you love sick with cancer Sick in a dream during recovery The patient is healed A sick person in the hospital Interpretation of illness and the sick person in a dream Seeing a sick person in a dream means that that person, or there may be another person in his life, is a hypocrite or selfish Or an enemy to whoever stays with him. Seeing a cancer patient in a dream If one sees a cancer patient in his dream, this means that this person suffers from many defects and the difficulty of healing and repairing them, and it can also indicate that person’s stinginess or that he is a person who loves travel and money. It can mean This vision also means that this person will make a mistake or some crisis, and seeing a cancer patient in a dream can portend a disaster in this country and the worsening condition of his family and their suffering, God forbid. A sick person you love in a dream. If you see someone you love sick in a dream, this means how much you love this person. The person and that he exchanges a degree of love, affection, and respect for you, and the more pain and suffering this person suffers from his illness, the more he shows how much he loves you. Like the patient in the hospital, commentators said that seeing a bedridden patient in the hospital foretells that you will overcome a crisis or experience, and if that patient you saw In the hospital, asleep and comfortable, this means that your future affairs will go well. As for seeing a patient in the hospital in pain and crying from severe pain or bleeding, this means that you cannot manage your affairs or that you will waste money or leave your job, God forbid. Seeing an injured patient With a serious and incurable disease in a dream. If one sees in a dream that there is a patient suffering from a serious and incurable disease or that this patient’s symptoms indicate his imminent death and that this sick person is someone you know, this means that this person is going through a financial crisis or is in trouble. , even if it wasn't really clear to him. It may be an indication of a deficiency in that person’s religion and personality. If you are sick and you do not know him, the interpretation of the dream will be directed to you, as this vision indicates that your social or economic situation is difficult and may warn you that you have neglected your religion or cut off your uterus. Seeing a healthy person in reality is sick in A dream: If you see a healthy, healthy person who is, in fact, sick, in a dream, it means that this person is a hypocrite, a liar, and has bad morals, or that this person is hiding some things from you because he is interested in that. , although it is necessary to inform you of this.Visiting a sick person in a dreamIbn Sirin said that seeing a sick person visiting in a dream portends the disappearance of worries, the death of sadness, the arrival of semi-relief and hearing happy news soon.Seeing a sick person in a dreamSeeing a sick person being healed in a dream has many connotations. Basically, it indicates hearing good news, and if the sick person is known to you, then his recovery indicates repentance from sin and a return to the path of reward and righteousness. Seeing a sick patient recovering in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells her marriage, and in a married woman’s dream it is a sign of pregnancy, and in a dream A pregnant woman indicates the ease of childbirth, her safety, and her safety from
preview.text: Contents: Seeing someone I know sick Someone you love sick with cancer Sick in a dream during recovery The patient is healed A sick person in the hospital Interpretation of illness and the sick person in a dream Seeing a sick person in a dream means that that person, or there may be another person in his life, is a hypocrite or selfish Or an enemy to whoever stays with him. Seeing a cancer patient in a dream If one sees a cancer patient in his dream, this means that this person suffers from many defects and the difficulty of healing and repairing them, and it can also indicate that person’s stinginess or that he is a person who loves travel and money. It can mean This vision also means that this person will make a mistake or some crisis, and seeing a cancer patient in a dream can portend a disaster in this country and the worsening condition of his family and their suffering, God forbid. A sick person you love in a dream. If you see someone you love sick in a dream, this means how much you love this person. The person and that he exchanges a degree of love, affection, and respect for you, and the more pain and suffering this person suffers from his illness, the more he shows how much he loves you. Like the patient in the hospital, commentators said that seeing a bedridden patient in the hospital foretells that you will overcome a crisis or experience, and if that patient you saw In the hospital, asleep and comfortable, this means that your future affairs will go well. As for seeing a patient in the hospital in pain and crying from severe pain or bleeding, this means that you cannot manage your affairs or that you will waste money or leave your job, God forbid. Seeing an injured patient With a serious and incurable disease in a dream. If one sees in a dream that there is a patient suffering from a serious and incurable disease or that this patient’s symptoms indicate his imminent death and that this sick person is someone you know, this means that this person is going through a financial crisis or is in trouble. , even if it wasn't really clear to him. It may be an indication of a deficiency in that person’s religion and personality. If you are sick and you do not know him, the interpretation of the dream will be directed to you, as this vision indicates that your social or economic situation is difficult and may warn you that you have neglected your religion or cut off your uterus. Seeing a healthy person in reality is sick in A dream: If you see a healthy, healthy person who is, in fact, sick, in a dream, it means that this person is a hypocrite, a liar, and has bad morals, or that this person is hiding some things from you because he is interested in that. , although it is necessary to inform you of this.Visiting a sick person in a dreamIbn Sirin said that seeing a sick person visiting in a dream portends the disappearance of worries, the death of sadness, the arrival of semi-relief and hearing happy news soon.Seeing a sick person in a dreamSeeing a sick person being healed in a dream has many connotations. Basically, it indicates hearing good news, and if the sick person is known to you, then his recovery indicates repentance from sin and a return to the path of reward and righteousness. Seeing a sick patient recovering in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells her marriage, and in a married woman’s dream it is a sign of pregnancy, and in a dream A pregnant woman indicates the ease of childbirth, her safety, and her safety from

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit with worms

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit with worms in a dream. Many seek to explain what they see, so follow the lines below with us, as we learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating fruit with worms in a dream, and other details..Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit with worms in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating fruit With worms in a dream it could represent profit, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees black worms on his wrist, it may be a sign that God knows the unseen, as he can express gossip, and God has all knowledge. Also, seeing black worms in fruit can represent envy, and God knows. The unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating dirt in a dream. If a young man sees himself in a dream eating dirt, perhaps this is a sign of farewell, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married man eating dirt in a dream, this may be a sign of separation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen eating dirt, this may lead to separation. Among people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother eating dirt in a dream could be a sign of the loss of someone you love, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about me removing dirt in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: carrying dirt in a dream, and seeing her carrying dirt can mean carrying offspring, and God knows the unseen. Where it may indicate Carrying grandchildren, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself in a dream carrying a shawl of dirt, this may be a sign of religion, and God knows best. Where he can express what he suffers in religion, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was eating animal dung in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating animal dung in a dream. Which may indicate enmity, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself eating cow dung, this may indicate bad luck, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating cat dung, this may lead to a cheerful woman, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself eating dog dung, this may indicate a person. Bad, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was eating bird droppings in a dream. I dreamed that I was eating bird droppings in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing bird droppings in a dream could be a sign of food, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing bird droppings could mean good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees bird droppings in a dream, this indicates stability, and God knows best. I dreamed That I ate a coconut in a dream. I dreamed that I ate a coconut in a dream. It could lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees in a dream eating a coconut, perhaps this indicates marriage, and God knows all that no one has seen. If a married woman is seen eating a coconut in If the dreamer sees himself Eating garlic may be good and nourishing, and God knows best, while many scholars saw that

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sieve in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a sieve in a dream will be discussed in detail in this article, as it is one of the strange visions in a dream, especially since we are not accustomed to using it in reality. You may also be interested in knowing a dead person in a dream. Many scholars have interpreted it, such as Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi, and its meaning also differs from Single, married and pregnant women dream, and below we show you this interpretation in detail. See also: Seeing home furniture and rooms in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sieve in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a sieve in a dream in detail You may also be interested in knowing: The river in a dream Interpretation of seeing a sieve in a dream in detail, as Ibn Sirin said Sirin, shows a person who has honest money in his hands and legitimate profit flowing. Seeing a sieve in a dream indicates piety in profit, as well as distinguishing between correct and corrupt speech, and indicates the running out of dirhams and dinars. Seeing it indicates guidance after misguidance, and repentance after disobedience, and it may indicate that the ruler He drowns between truth and falsehood, and may indicate someone who cannot tolerate evil. The sieve indicates evil and amusement; Because it separates things and does not bring them together. It was said that the sieve is the man who distinguishes between loved ones and the family, and it is said that the sieve is a comb, because it removes dirt. See also: Crying and injustice in a dream. Interpretation of a sieve in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Seeing a sieve in a dream means that the ruler is drowning between truth and falsehood. Perhaps it indicates a person who does not carry evil. The sieve indicates a person’s guidance and repentance after his misguidance and disobedience. Sifting flour in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the date of her approaching marriage or marriage. See also: The girl in a dream. The sieve in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. And whoever sees that it is a sieve, this is evidence. On his diligence in a matter, and collecting it as much as a sieve, and it was said that by seeing the sieve, he is a man whose honest money flows into his hands. He agrees with this with Ibn Sirin, and in general, seeing a sieve is interpreted in four aspects: A reformer. A strange woman. A bad servant and a little benefit. See also: The plane in a dream. Interpretation of a sieve in a dream for a single woman. Commentators said that seeing a sieve in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates Man, therefore: If an unmarried girl sees a sieve in her dream, it means that she will soon meet a good man who is characterized by kindness, justice, and good morals, both in his field of work and in his family. If an unmarried woman dreams that she sees a sieve, and her financial situation is difficult in reality, This dream is a sign that she will obtain a lot of sustenance in the coming period, God willing. If a girl dreams that she saw a sieve and she was in reality in her studies and put a lot of effort into her studies, then this is a sign that she will pass the exams, succeed in her desires, and graduate. From her university.Read more: Interpretation of a wife’s request for divorce in a dream. Seeing a sieve in a dream for a married woman. Commentators have indicated that seeing a married woman sifting in her dream is evidence of sustenance and money, and therefore seeing a married woman sifting her hand in a dream indicates

title: Interpretation of flour in a dream. The meaning of seeing flour in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you what the interpretation of flour in a dream is, according to what the great scholar Al-Nabulsi said in his book Interpretation of Dreams. Pastries, pastries, sweets, and the sleeper sees flour in his dream, and wants to know what the interpretation of this vision is and what it means, and does it have a meaning or is it a dream that does not symbolize anything, and religious scholars have the clearest interpretation that this vision differs in its interpretation according to the social status of the sleeping person, and for this we will explain to you Through the encyclopedia paragraphs that follow what is the interpretation of seeing flour in a dream for one person. A girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Interpretation of flour in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing flour in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that convey to the dreamer good news of the arrival of huge and abundant livelihood in his life. If the sleeper sees rice flour in his dream, this is a sign that Wonderful and blessed food will come into his life, but this food will come after extreme fatigue and toil. Seeing semolina flour in a dream symbolizes a good husband for an unmarried girl and a married woman, and for a man, this vision indicates a prominent position in society. If a student sees semolina flour in his dream This is a good vision that promises him success and excellence in the coming days. If the dreamer is sick and sees flour in his dream, then this is a dream of Mahmoud, foretelling the dreamer of recovery in the near future and that God will give him health and well-being. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is making dough from wheat flour, then this is a sign. On a trip close to him. Interpretation of flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The respected scholar Ibn Shaheen says that seeing flour in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a great livelihood in the coming days and may earn a lot of money. And if the sleeper sees barley flour in his dream, this is a good vision that indicates that The dreamer follows the straight path and is religious, and his heart is attached to worship. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is selling flour, this is an unpleasant vision, and it appears that he is committing many sins, and selling the afterlife. Imam Ibn Shaheen says that seeing flour in a dream without eating bread means that the dreamer He will suffer from poverty and hardship. Interpretation of a dream about flour by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that seeing flour in a dream symbolizes achieving a prestigious position, recovering from diseases, obtaining wide and abundant food, and satisfying the desires that the viewer wants in life. If the sleeper sees flour in his dream, this is a promising vision. It means that the door of repentance is still open and he must return to the Almighty Lord and approach Him with obedience and good deeds. Seeing barley flour in a dream indicates a religiosity free of neglect and innovation. If the dreamer suffers from accumulating debts, and sees flour in his dream, then this is good news that he will pay it off. All his debts. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is kneading flour, this is a sign that he will move to a new city, and this vision also indicates an affordable financial situation. Seeing flour in a dream foretells the dreamer’s victory in his life, the acquisition of many spoils, and the appearance of blessing in the system

title: Interpretation of cemeteries in a dream by Ibn Sirin Walking in cemeteries in a dream and interpretation of a dream about praying in cemeteries in a dream

preview.html: Cemeteries in a dream, interpreters believe that the dream shows good, but sometimes it symbolizes evil, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing graves for single, married, pregnant women and men according to Ibn Sirin and the elderly. Interpretation scholars. Cemeteries in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing graves in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about graves indicates the approaching marriage if the dreamer is single, and if the dreamer sees an open grave in his dream, this indicates the fairness of his condition and his closeness to God (Glory be to Him). It was said that The dream indicates imprisonment or a feeling of distress and sadness, and if the dreamer sees himself buried in graves while he is alive, this indicates his failure in the duties of his religion and his distance from the path of its integrity. To see yourself leaving the graves or running away from them indicates repentance of sins and returning to the Lord. (Glory be to Him) and walking on the path of truth. If the dreamer sees himself visiting Christian cemeteries in his dream, this symbolizes his feeling of loneliness due to the separation of one of his family members. Cemeteries in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees himself walking in cemeteries, then the dream indicates that he is an introvert and does not like to socialize. With people, the vision urges him to change himself and try to be social so that he can enjoy the company of people and get rid of it. From his loneliness. An indication that the visionary is a negative, unambitious person who does not want to develop, and the dream carries a message for him telling him to set a goal for himself and try to achieve it in order to engage in something useful and not waste it. His time is in vain. Ibn Sirin believes that the dream indicates that the dreamer feels sad and lonely because of a major dispute with his family and his distance from them, or that he feels psychological pressure due to his poor financial condition and the accumulation of debts on him. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: Dream Interpretation Site Egyptian on Google and get the correct interpretations. Cemeteries in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about graves for an unmarried woman indicates that she has entered a new stage in her life, and interpretive scholars believe that the dream indicates that her marriage is approaching with a good person whom she will fall in love with at first sight. An indication of her psychological state Bad news due to her emotional shock in the current period. The dream also symbolizes financial hardship and loss of money. If the dreamer sees himself visiting graves at night, the vision indicates that she is a righteous girl seeking the satisfaction of God Almighty and drawing closer to Him by doing good deeds. The dream indicates feelings of sadness. And weakness due to failure in study or work, which serves as a warning to the dreamer not to give up and to continue trying until he achieves his goals. If an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream visiting a cemetery and reciting Surat Al-Fatihah, this means that her prayers will be answered and her desires will be fulfilled very soon. The cemetery in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation A dream about graves for a married woman indicates that major disagreements will occur with her husband during this period, and if she sees her husband walking in dark graves, this means that he will sin against her, but he will. We regret it very much and ask her to forgive him.If she sees the dream
